fields.name: controller
fields.desc: Controls the text being edited in the search bar's text field.

fields.name: focusNode
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.widgets.Focus.focusNode}

fields.name: hintText
fields.desc: Text that suggests what sort of input the field accepts.

fields.name: leading
fields.desc: A widget to display before the text input field.

fields.name: trailing
fields.desc: A list of Widgets to display in a row after the text field.

fields.name: onTap
fields.desc: Called when the user taps this search bar.

fields.name: onTapOutside
fields.desc: Called when the user taps outside the search bar.

fields.name: onChanged
fields.desc: Invoked upon user input.

fields.name: onSubmitted
fields.desc: Called when the user indicates that they are done editing the text in the field.

fields.name: constraints
fields.desc: Optional size constraints for the search bar.

fields.name: elevation
fields.desc: The elevation of the search bar's [Material].

fields.name: backgroundColor
fields.desc: The search bar's background fill color.

fields.name: shadowColor
fields.desc: The shadow color of the search bar's [Material].

fields.name: surfaceTintColor
fields.desc: The surface tint color of the search bar's [Material].

fields.name: overlayColor
fields.desc: The highlight color that's typically used to indicate that the search bar is focused, hovered, or pressed.

fields.name: side
fields.desc: The color and weight of the search bar's outline.

fields.name: shape
fields.desc: The shape of the search bar's underlying [Material].

fields.name: padding
fields.desc: The padding between the search bar's boundary and its contents.

fields.name: textStyle
fields.desc: The style to use for the text being edited.

fields.name: hintStyle
fields.desc: The style to use for the [hintText].

fields.name: textCapitalization
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.widgets.editableText.textCapitalization}

fields.name: enabled
fields.desc: Whether or not this widget is currently interactive.

fields.name: autoFocus
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.widgets.editableText.autofocus}

fields.name: textInputAction
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.widgets.TextField.textInputAction}

fields.name: keyboardType
fields.desc: The type of action button to use for the keyboard.

fields.name: scrollPadding
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.widgets.editableText.scrollPadding}

fields.name: contextMenuBuilder
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.widgets.EditableText.contextMenuBuilder}
